tool_description: An API that retrieves upcoming Light Novel titles from various sites
title: Upcoming Light Novels

api_list.name: Get available sources
api_list.description: This endpoints will return the available light novels sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upcoming-light-novels.p.rapidapi.com/lns"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcoming-light-novels.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get titles from specific source
api_list.description: Get Light Novel titles from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upcoming-light-novels.p.rapidapi.com/lns/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcoming-light-novels.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
